001package org.relationlearn.model;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007
008/**
009 * ArgumentNode implementation that uses a Map to store its reply
010 * ArgumentRelations.
011 * 
012 * @see ArgumentNode
013 */
014public class NodeImpl implements ArgumentNode {
015    
016    private int nodeID;
017    private int nodeWeight;
018    
019    private ArgumentRelation targetRelation;
020    private final Map<Integer, ArgumentRelation> repliesTable;
021    
022    private String nodeText;
023    
024    private NodeImpl() {
025        this.repliesTable = new HashMap<>();
026    }
027    
028    /**
029     * Construct a new NodeImpl with id {@code nId}, weight {@code nW} and
030     * node text {@code text}.
031     * 
032     * @param nID identifier of this NodeImpl
033     * @param nW weight of this NodeImpl
034     * @param text complete text of this NodeImpl
035     */
036    public NodeImpl(int nID, int nW, String text) {
037        this();
038        this.nodeID = nID;
039        this.nodeWeight = nW;
040        this.nodeText = text;
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public int getNodeId() {
045        return this.nodeID;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public int getNodeWeight() {
050        return this.nodeWeight;
051    }
052    
053    @Override
054    public void addTargetRelation(ArgumentRelation aRel) {
055        this.targetRelation = aRel;
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public ArgumentRelation getTargetRelation() {
060        return this.targetRelation;
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public ArgumentRelation getReplayRelation(int relationId) {
065        return this.repliesTable.get(relationId);
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public List<ArgumentRelation> getReplyRelations() {
070        return new ArrayList<>(this.repliesTable.values());
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public void addReplyRelation(ArgumentRelation relation) {
075        if(!repliesTable.containsKey(relation.getArgumentRelationId())) {
076            this.repliesTable.put(relation.getArgumentRelationId(), relation);
077        }
078    }
079    
080    @Override
081    public String getArgumentNodeText() {
082        return this.nodeText;
083    }
084    
085    /** 
086     * Returns a String representation of this NodeImpl and its
087     * contents.
088     * 
089     * @return a String representation of this NodeImpl and its contents
090     */
091    @Override
092    public String toString() {
093        String str = "";
094        str += "Node id: " + this.getNodeId() + "\n";
095        str += "\tWeight: " + this.getNodeWeight() + "\n";
096        str += "\tText: " + this.getArgumentNodeText() + "\n";
097        if(this.getTargetRelation() == null) {
098            str += "\tTarget: NONE\n";
099        } else {
100            str += "\tTarget: " + this.getTargetRelation().getTarget().getNodeId() + " (" + this.getTargetRelation().getArgumentRelationType() + ")\n";
101        }
102        str += "\tReplies from: ";
103        for(ArgumentRelation ar : repliesTable.values()) {
104            str += ar.getArgumentator().getNodeId() + " ";
105        }
106        str += "\n";
107        return str;
108    }
109
110}
